sentences.sContent: Victims have ranged from the great auk and the lynx to the humble blue stag beetle and Davall's sedge.
sentences.sContent_eng: Victims have ranged from the great auk and the lynx to the humble blue stag beetle and Davall's sedge.
sentences.sCn: 受害者从大型海雀、猞猁到不值一提的蓝色鹿角虫和Davall's莎草。

sentences.sContent: So the sedge which lines the banks knows hardly any disturbance until the fishermen come with their nets.
sentences.sContent_eng: So the sedge which lines the banks knows hardly any disturbance until the fishermen come with their nets.
sentences.sCn: 连两岸的莎草没有带着渔网前来的渔夫的打搅也几乎从不摇摆。

sentences.sContent: The rain and mist can't mask the funky rot. Pink and chum salmon carcasses lie tangled in linguine strands of tidal sedge.
sentences.sContent_eng: The rain and mist can't mask the funky rot. Pink and chum salmon carcasses lie tangled in linguine strands of tidal sedge.
sentences.sCn: 薄薄的雨雾并不能遮盖腐臭的味道，粉红色大马哈鱼的尸体杂乱地缠绕在一缕缕潮汐冲来的莎草中。

trans.tranOther: a plant similar to grass that grows in wet ground and on the edge of rivers and lakes
